function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unauthorized access to restricted content","Impact":"Potential breach of privacy and security","Mitigation":"Implement secure authentication and access control measures","Technologies":"Encryption, Multi-factor authentication","People":"Users, administrators, data owners","Owner":"IT department, cybersecurity team"},{"Description":"Misuse of downloaded content","Impact":"Violation of copyright and licensing regulations","Mitigation":"Educate users on copyright laws and monitor content usage","Technologies":"Digital rights management, Content monitoring tools","People":"Users, content creators, administrators","Owner":"Legal department, content management team"},{"Description":"Data loss or corruption during download","Impact":"Loss of important data and resources","Mitigation":"Regular backups and use of reliable download tools","Technologies":"Backup systems, Reliable download managers","People":"Users, data owners, administrators","Owner":"IT department, data management team"}]}
